thread.title: Thomas Rawls' journey from Flint, Mich., to Seattle Seahawks

title: Thomas Rawls' journey from Flint, Mich., to Seattle Seahawks
text:
Facebook Email Twitter Google+ LinkedIn Pinterest Thomas Rawls' journey from Flint, Mich., to Seattle Seahawks Thomas Rawls grew up in one of the roughest neighborhoods in Flint, Michigan, on East Foss Avenue. Paul Silvi talk to his father Thomas Rawls Sr., his grandmother and his high school coach Fred Jackson about Rawls' journey to the NFL. KING Paul Silvi, KING 5 Sports 2:27 p.m. PDT October 14, 2015 Sep 27, 2015; Seattle, WA, USA; Seattle Seahawks running back Thomas Rawls (34) breaks away from Chicago Bears linebacker Sam Acho (49) during the third quarter at CenturyLink Field. The Seahawks won 26-0. (Photo: Troy Wayrynen, USA TODAY Sports) CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE
